##Viridis colors
```{r include = FALSE}
library(viridis)
library(jpeg)
```

```{r}
img <- readJPEG("remote.jpg")
rv <- rev(img)
m <- matrix(rv, nrow = 551, ncol = 319, byrow = TRUE)
image(z = m, col = viridis(200, option = "A"))
```
